variants.Description in input context: mutations found throughout the gene including the kinase domain

Mutations' impact on cell phenotype.impact on cells: increase in tendency to form inclusion bodies
neurons and neuronal cell lines undergo cell death after expression of mutant protein

Mutations' impact on kinase activity.kinase activity importance: required for the damaging effects of pathogenic mutations
Mutations' impact on kinase activity.manipulation impact: replacing the kinase domain with a Fkinase-dead version blocks inclusion body formation and strongly delays cell death
